DOC.detailed_description: Research purpose : To assess Impact hormone therapy quality life early post-menopausal woman ; To assess Impact hormone therapy cardiovascular system early post-menopausal woman ; To assess Impact hormone therapy cognitive function early post-menopausal woman ; To assess Impact hormone therapy osteoporosis early post-menopausal woman . Study Design : The clinical trial research divide 2 group . Treatment group give estradiol valerate 1mg/d , periodic application medroxyprogesterone 6mg/d 10 day , calcium 900mg/d , VitD200iu/d exercise ( Brisk walk every day 2 time , continue 10 minute time ) . Control group give placebo , calcium , VitD exercise treatment group .
